column4: Ok, I think I got it.  The command was /sbin/sysctl -w "net.ipv4.tcp_window_scaling=0".  It works if I remove the quoted arguments.
you want to exclude certain commands from needing a sudo password?
Yeah, need to let a user/group use sysctl to turn window scaling on and off.
I can't seem to include the arguments to sysctl in the sudo specification
